data.text: @Hassayampa_Slim Thank you, I am much better today!  THE plumber left without turning some handle so the hot water heater still not spewing hot water out my faucets...but it will, pray hard!
@PeggyMercer Dang, sorry to hear you're down from that shot. Looks like it's too cold to go out anyway, so wrap up in a snug blanket, and enjoy hot soups today. Hoping you do better tomorrow 😱😷🌵

@PeggyMercer Arthur had a reaction of fever yesterday and achy today.  He was able to go to the store, but definitely has had a reaction. I did not have much reaction.  My immune response not as strong...
